pageContext.claim: “She [Hillary Clinton] lost and now they are trying to infiltrate the administration to -- really, it's a coup.”
pageContext.analysis: The suggestion here is that FBI officials Peter Strzok and Lisa Page were trying to find someone to "infiltrate" the Trump administration. That's based on a bogus claim circulating in right-wing media. The theory is that Strzok and Page were trying to recruit an aide to Mike Pence named Josh Pitcock, whose wife works at the FBI, to be the mole. "If Katie's husband is there, he can see if there are people we can develop for potential relationships," Strzok said in one text message. But that mere mention is not evidence for Trump's explosive allegation that the FBI was trying to infiltrate his administration. Pitcock has vehemently denied that he or his wife were involved in any such plans, calling the speculation "100% false."
